txt.en: 'That's quite the bounty of helms you've recovered. I wonder what the crebain planned to do with them all? Perhaps they just enjoy the way they catch the light.'
Recovery headwear at Ghât Okho and fight off crebain.
Crebain have been stealing helms and hats from the good citizens of Urmâkh. A local scout has tracked them to Ghât Okho. You are to recover the headwear from these brazen winged thieves.
